headline: Flowers Foods: It Usually Isn't This Cheap

headline: 1 Dividend Growth Stock Down 25% to Buy Right Now
summary: Share prices of PepsiCo (NASDAQ: PEP) hit an all-time high in the first half of 2023.  If you have been watching this consumer staples giant waiting for a good entry price, this is it.  Here's why you should buy PepsiCo right now if you are a dividend growth investor.

headline: 3 Reasons to Buy PepsiCo Stock Like There's No Tomorrow
summary: Which is why you won't want to wait until some tomorrow to start buying PepsiCo (NASDAQ: PEP) stock.  Shares of consumer staples giant PepsiCo have lost nearly a quarter of their value since early 2023.  It has pushed the dividend yield up to around 3.6%, near the highest levels in the company's history.

headline: Prediction: These 2 Hypergrowth Stocks Will Make Investors Richer in 2025
summary: Perhaps it is time for growth investors to change their gaze and look for other growth stocks to buy in 2025.  Here's why Remitly Global (NASDAQ: RELY) and Celsius Holdings (NASDAQ: CELH) are buys for your portfolio in 2025.  Revenue growth was close to 100% in the fourth quarter of 2023, leading to a new all-time high for its share price.
